recipesJson.name: Remix of Wayne's remix on red's
recipesJson.author: Jbirdy34
recipesJson.description: Never had reds but I'm loving what I made here. Crisp apple with a nice green tart exhale. It's the simple ones that turn out delicious. See my issue with remixes and clones is i refuse to buy any commercial juice i rather spend that money on my concentrates. If you try it enjoy. Thx to Mr DoD for the inspiration!

pageContext.name: Remix of Wayne's remix on red's
